DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes self-management education : In first three month PLEASED , patient type 2 diabetes participate 12 weekly session : 6 session focus diabetes education deliver health professional 6 session focus lifestyle change deliver peer leader . Education session 2-hours long facilitated nurse , dietician , pharmacist . Patients learn diabetes disease process , lifestyle modification , healthy eating , physical activity , medication , monitoring , short- long- complication , diabetes distress , cop . Lifestyle change session 1-hour long start 30 minute physical activity follow 30 minute goal-setting , action planning , problem solving . Additional activity recipe makeover exchange also include . Diabetes self-management support : In next nine month PLEASED program , patient invite attend 32 weekly self-management support session ( 1-hour long ) facilitate peer leader . The goal session help patient continue make positive lifestyle change . Each support session start 30 minute physical activity lead peer leader follow discussion participant invite ( 1 ) discuss self-management challenge , ( 2 ) share thought feeling challenge , ( 3 ) ask self-management question , ( 4 ) engage problem solving , ( 5 ) set self-management goal design behavioral experiment achieve goal . Patients invited attend frequently need able give compete life demand . While session focus lifestyle change emotional support , participant able obtain response medical clinical question 811 PLEASED hotline ( hosted dietician , nurse , pharmacist ) . All patient enrol PLEASED program undergo three free health assessment : start program , 3 month , 12 month . Health assessment include measure glycemic control , ApoB , blood pressure , waist circumference , weight , body mass index . All patient also complete survey assess quality life , social support , depression , self-efficacy .
